dcterms:creator: M. Tomita
dcterms:description: A set of grammars used for studying DFA extraction from recurrent networks, consisting of seven regular grammars that generate infinite languages over binary strings.
dcterms:title: Tomita grammars

dcterms:creator: Q. Wang

dcterms:description: A dataset generated by a grammar G, used for evaluating the performance of recurrent neural networks in rule extraction tasks.
dcterms:title: BG (data set generated by a grammar G)

dcterms:creator: Q. Wang
K. Zhang
A. G. Ororbia II
X. Xing
X. Liu
C. L. Giles
dcterms:description: The training set used for evaluating the performance of recurrent neural networks in rule extraction tasks.
dcterms:title: Btrain (training set)

dcterms:creator: Q. Wang
K. Zhang
A. G. Ororbia II
X. Xing
X. Liu
C. L. Giles
dcterms:description: The test set used for evaluating the performance of recurrent neural networks in rule extraction tasks.
dcterms:title: Btest (test set)
